column2: Press Menu Button to\n open controller menu.
Press START to begin\n the Learning Process.
Press SELECT GRAB Button
Touch the target object\n with the controller. \n Press and hold the trigger

Hold trigger and move object 
 to target area.
 Drop trigger to release 
 the object.

Press USE SNAP to \n enable the snapping mode.
Press Menu Button to \n close controller menu.

Press Menu Button to \n open controller menu.

Press SHOW TIPS to 
 repeat the complete 
 teaching procedure. 
 Or choose specific methods 
 to train a reliable use. 
  Press STOP to begin 
 the actual study,
  if you feel comfortable 
 with every method.

Walk on the appearing 
 red area to switch to 
 the study scene. 
 It is a supermarket!
